form.name: form1

div.span: Gov. DeWine has announced that schools will complete this academic year online due to Coronavirus concerns.
We will be concluding the remainder of our school year

with online learning and Google Classroom lessons. Students, please continue to login and complete daily assignments provided by your teachers. Progress Book will continue to be updated as well. The last day for seniors is May 18, and the last day for the rest of our students is May 21, 2020.
Parents who are helping our younger Rangers access their Google Classrooms,

a.span: please click here for complete instructions on how to correctly sign-in

div.span: If you have trouble logging into Google and accessing Google Classroom, contact your child's teacher for correct login information.

a.span: We have an alphabetical list of teacher email addresses - click here

span.em: (If you are accessing this with a smartphone, turn the phone sideways to landscape to access all of the information)

div.span: If you have other needs or questions related to things other than Google Classroom, contact your child's school at 614-491-8044. Preschool - ext 1231, Elementary - ext 1300, Intermediate - ext 1600, Middle - ext 1500, and High School - ext 1800.
If you need Wi-Fi in your home,

a.span: click this link to get information to order

div.span: We will provide more information as it becomes available.

div.div:
775 Rathmell Road
Columbus, Ohio 43207
P: (614) 491-8044
F: (614) 491-8323

img.data-title: Google Classroom and Online Learning Opportunities Now Posted
img.data-caption: Click the read more button below to access learning resource and google classroom links. You can access them on a computer or mobile device.

img.data-title: "Grab & Go" Meals Only Distributed on Mondays
img.data-caption: Our "Grab & Go" meals will only be distributed on Mondays to those who have signed up for the service. Meals will be distributed for all five weekdays.

img.data-title: No More Paper Forms Makes Everyone Happy!
img.data-caption: All of our back to school forms and new student registration processes are now online! Click the "Read More" below to access instructions to take advantage of this convenient and easy system.
Next year's school calendar was approved by our Board of Education and available to the community for reference.

img.data-title: Hamilton Local is now searching for substitute bus drivers
img.data-caption: If you're interested in becoming a substitute bus driver for our school district, please contact our Transportation Office at 614-491-8044 ext. 1236

div.a: April Board of Education Meeting Canceled
div.span: Due to the social distancing and stay at home orders made by the State of Ohio, we have canceled this month's meeting on April 13, 2020.
